hymn.title: Come, ye disconsolate, where'er ye languish
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Mercy-Seat

layout.singingstanza: Come, ye dis -- con -- so -- late, wher -- e'er ye lan -- guish; Come to the mer -- cy- -- seat, fer -- vent -- ly kneel; Here bring your wound -- ed hearts, here tell your an -- guish, Earth has no sor -- row that heaven can -- not heal.

lyrics.stanza: Here see the Bread of Life; see waters flowing Forth from the throne of God, pure from above; Come to the feast of love; come, ever knowing Earth has no sorrow but heaven can remove.
